ygData.subject: Re: Exploring the windmills
ygData.msgSnippet: I highly doubt that the third book or even any tinkering info would be found from killing gnomes.Why would we have to kill our own to get something for a gnome
ygData.messageBody:
I highly doubt that the third book or even any tinkering info would be found
from killing gnomes.Why would we have to kill our own to get something for a
gnome only skill.that would mean taking faction hits just to get something
that a gnome should have .But thats just my opinion, so im not going out
killing any gnomes for it.I think that you are looking in the wrong place by
doing that


Xalumkin of Bertoxx
